channel.title: Puan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Puan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Puan’ Co-Helmer Benjamín Nashtat, Composer Santiago Dolan Board Sanfic Industria WIP Title ‘Bagman’
item.description: Sanfic Industria WIP title “Bagman” (“Valijero”) boasts several ties to lauded 2023 dramedy “Puan.” Argentine director Esteban Trivisonno was an assistant director to “Puan” co-helmer Benjamín Nashtat

item.title: ‘Puan’ Co-Helmer Benjamín Nashtat, Composer Santiago Dolan Board Sanfic Industria WIP Title ‘Bagman’
item.description: Sanfic Industria WIP title “Bagman” (“Valijero”) boasts several ties to lauded 2023 dramedy “Puan.” Argentine director Esteban Trivisonno was an assistant director to “Puan” co-helmer Benjamín Nashtat
